hotels.description: Step into your private island retreat in the Maldives, surrounded by the serene turquoise waters of the Shaviyani Atoll. Sirru Fen Fushi is your gateway to effortless island living, with 120 beach-chic villas, each with a private pool and direct beach or lagoon access. Take the indulgence to new heights with the All-Inclusive Upgrade, complete with breakfast, lunch and dinner - plus unlimited daily free-flow select drinks. Relax by the Maldivesâ€™ longest infinity pool, sipping cocktails and basking in the sunshine, or cool off in the crystal-clear lagoon. The house reef is a true highlight - one of the largest in the Maldives - located just 50 metres from shore and brimming with vibrant marine life, offering an unforgettable underwater experience. Paddle across serene waters in a canoe or embark on a sailing adventure. As night falls, unwind with a movie at the outdoor cinema under a canopy of stars. The dining here is not to be missed. Begin your day with an exquisite breakfast buffet of international delights or a la carte dining at the Raha Market, and return in the evening for dinner. The seasonal menu ranges from authentic Italian pizza and Shaviyani Atoll tuna to Asian, Indian and Arab flavours. For a change of pace, savour Japanese delicacies at the enchanting overwater restaurant Kata or enjoy premium seafood at the beachfront Azure.
